reports_summary: From a single write-up, the Steam Deck OLED runs Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor in the high‑50s FPS and feels smooth and stable for most play, with occasional dips during heavier encounters. Power draw sits around 16 W, so battery drains at a steady clip and sessions will likely run a few hours rather than all day. The report ran via Proton and kept a high FPS cap; dropping that cap or easing a couple of effects is the clearest way to tighten frame pacing while keeping the visual fidelity.
